title: Metal Bastard's Best of 2011
description:
Tracks from the best albums of 2011 according to the now-defunct blogs Metal Bastard and Metal Bastard Goes Soft. Nowadays check metalbastard[dot]tumblr[dot]com for all of your musical needs.

Features:

A.A. Bondy
Amebix
Bastard Priest
Beastie Boys
Cave In
Charles Bradley & The Menahan Street Band
Ciaran Lenehan
The Decemberists
Deportees
Entrails
Fair to Midland
Fleet Foxes
Foo Fighters
Giant Squid
Gillian Welch
Ginger Trees
Graveyard
Henric de la Cour
Illuminatus
INVSN
Jeremy Irons & The Ratgang Malibus
Junius
Lady Gaga
Little Dragon
Maim
Mastodon
Morbus Chron
Of Verona
Opeth
P.J. Harvey
Puscifer
Red Fang
Russian Circles
Svante Thuresson
Syphilitic Vaginas
Tom Waits
Wallis Bird
